srf-paramdesc-color: The colour to mark calendar entries
srf_paramdesc_calendarcolors: The colour to display for each date property (example: "Start date=>green,End date=>#09c")
srf-paramdesc-graphcolor: Sets the colour of the graph
srf-paramdesc-clustercolor: Sets the colours the cluster boxes
srf-paramdesc-highlightcolor: Sets the font colour for the highlighted node
srf-paramdesc-redlinkcolor: Sets the font colour for the red links
